org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.tamino.installer Contains a command-line application used to install/define a Tamino schema into a running Tamino database.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.tamino.tx Contains classes and interfaces necessary for implementing transaction support for the Tamino DB impl.

Classes in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.xmldb used by org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.exist
AeXMLDBConfig
          This class encapsulates the XMLDB XQuery statements used by the Active BPEL XMLDB based persistence layer.
AeXMLDBException
          An exception that is thrown when an error occurs in the XMLDB layer.
AeXMLDBStorageProviderFactory
          A storage factory that creates XMLDB versions of the store objects.
IAeXMLDBConnection
          A connection to an XML database.
IAeXMLDBDataSource
          An interface that defines the set of methods needed to give access to the XMLDB database.
IAeXMLDBResponseHandler
          This interface defines a way in which XMLDB query results are handled and returned as a List.
IAeXMLDBStorageImpl
          Instances of this interface must implement the parts of the XMLDB storage framework that are implementation specific.
IAeXMLDBXQueryResponse
          Represents an XQuery response from an XML database.
